languages.text: "Может, это не проклятье, а дар? Дар долгой жизни и многих подвигов".
"What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."
languages.original_text: "Может, это не проклятье, а дар? Дар долгой жизни и многих подвигов".

traits.locale_text: "What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."
"What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."
"What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."
"What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."

languages.text: “如果这不是诅咒，而是祝福呢？祝福你可以活得长久，赢得无数伟大的功绩。”
languages.original_text: "What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."

traits.locale_text: “如果这不是诅咒，而是祝福呢？祝福你可以活得长久，赢得无数伟大的功绩。”

languages.text: «¿Y si en vez de ser una maldición es un regalo? El regalo de una larga vida llena de hazañas».
languages.original_text: "What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si en vez de ser una maldición es un regalo? El regalo de una larga vida llena de hazañas».

languages.text: 「呪いではなく、贈り物だとしたら？長寿と偉大な功績の贈り物だ」
languages.original_text: "What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."

traits.locale_text: 「呪いではなく、贈り物だとしたら？長寿と偉大な功績の贈り物だ」

languages.text: "Was, wenn es kein Fluch ist, sondern eine Gabe? Eine Gabe des langen Lebens und der vielen großen Abenteuer."
languages.original_text: "What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."

traits.locale_text: "Was, wenn es kein Fluch ist, sondern eine Gabe? Eine Gabe des langen Lebens und der vielen großen Abenteuer."

languages.text: « Et si ce n'était pas une malédiction, mais un don ? La bénédiction d'une vie longue et jalonnée de maints exploits. »
languages.original_text: "What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."

traits.locale_text: « Et si ce n'était pas une malédiction, mais un don ? La bénédiction d'une vie longue et jalonnée de maints exploits. »

languages.text: "Ya bu bir lanet değil de armağansa? Uzun bir yaşam ve birçok yüce macera armağanı yani."
languages.original_text: "What if it is not a curse, but a gift? A gift of long life and many great exploits."

traits.locale_text: "Ya bu bir lanet değil de armağansa? Uzun bir yaşam ve birçok yüce macera armağanı yani."
